manifesto.title: People's Movement Manifesto
manifesto.introduction: As the People's Movement, we aim to preserve the core values of the republic while carrying it into the future through people's participation and strengthening social bonds.
manifesto.principle_1_desc: Preserving and strengthening the fundamental values of the republic by honoring Atatürk's legacy
manifesto.principle_2_desc: A transparent governance approach where all decisions are made with public participation
manifesto.principle_3_desc: A fair social order where all segments of society are equally represented
manifesto.principle_4_desc: Continuous renewal of democracy according to the current needs of the people
manifesto.principle_5_desc: An understanding of diversity where different cultures and values are seen as richness
manifesto.conclusion: In the journey of updating and carrying the republic into the future with the people, we want to shape the future of society by implementing these values together.
